title: L'age Ingrat = that Tender Age
description: Marie and Antoine are two students engaged to be married. Antoine's parents, who live in the south of France, invite Marie's parents to spend time with them and become acquainted. The two future fathers-in-law slowly become friends before a lover's quarrel between  their children threatens to jeopardize the upcoming marriage of Antoine and Marie.  Credits: Producer, Roger de Broin ; director, Gilles Grangier ; writers, Pascal Jardin, Claude Sautet, Gilles Grangier ; photography, Robert Le Febvre ; music, Georges Delerue. Cast: Marie Dubois, Fernandel, Franck Fernandel, Jean Gabin, Paulette Dubost, Noel Roquevert.
